room_title: Escape room "The Playroom" by The Final Clue in Portage
review: The Playroom was one of our favorite escape rooms so far! There were some really neat surprises! Our 11 and 14-year-old were also able to contribute a lot of help in the process, so it's a plus for families. We didn't quite finish, but were allowed to explore the final steps of completion before leaving. The young lady helping us was terrific! It was an awesome experience, and we will definitely be back to do the other room!

room_title: Escape room "The Playroom" by The Final Clue in Portage
review: As a group of 4 we escaped The Playroom with 19 min and 45 seconds left. It was a lot of fun! Challenge level was a bit low, this room is what i would consider a beginner or family room but we still had a lot of fun!

room_title: Escape room "The Playroom" by The Final Clue in Portage
review: Had a great time. Really liked some of the game elements in The Playroom. Thanks for a great time!

room_title: Escape room "The Playroom" by The Final Clue in Portage
review: Playroom was so much fun! Thanks Joel, we had a blast!

room_title: Escape room "The Playroom" by The Final Clue in Portage
review: Just finished up the night with a date night here, we did the Playroom, and had an absolutely fantastic time!! We highly recommend it!! We had so much fun!
